text: "You Turn Me On, I'm a Radio" is a 1972 song by Canadian singer Joni Mitchell. It was taken from her fifth studio album For the Roses. It went to number 25 in the United States, number 10 in Canada and number 37 in Australia. It was covered by country singer Gail Davies in 1982. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:Folk-pop songs Category:Joni Mitchell songs Category:Gail Davies songs
title: You Turn Me On, I'm a Radio
